__e: Haven't heard your dove call in ages.
As I said, better a small bird in the hand than a pigeon on the roof.
I've seen her take out the eye of a dove in flight.
I'm Paloma's real brother, and she'd be better off with me.
I bought the colomba and I don't know where to sleep.
Then I tape it to the pigeon's leg and it flies to my fiance's house and gives him the note.
